title: The Amazon Beauty Advent Calendar 2019 is finally available - and we predict a sell-out!
text:
Beauty advent calendars have grown in popularity with many beauty brands now offering swoon-worthy Christmas countdowns. And this year mega online retailer Amazon have outdone themselves with their Amazon Beauty Advent Calendar 2019 - and it has just gone on sale.

Costing just £40 (currently 20 per cent off), but worth over £220, the calendar from Amazon Beauty is one of our favourites of the season.

Amazon shoppers have already rated Amazon Beauty's 2019 Beauty Advent Calendar 4.4 stars

There's no doubt the limited edition beauty advent calendar will be a best-seller, particularly among Amazon Prime members - shoppers have already rated the advent calendar an average 4.4 out of 5 stars.

Behind each of the 24 doors lies a deluxe or full-sized beauty product from the site's most loved hair, skin and makeup brands. While we won't reveal what beauty treat is behind every single door, you can expect everything from beauty tools to false lashes, glitter, face masks and more.

It has a good balance of beauty products and includes all the ones you need to create festive makeup looks.

This year's calendar also includes a cult-favourite (and relatively pricey RRP £29) Luna Play Mini from Swedish tech beauty brand FOREO. The cleansing device is a favourite among beauty editors and influencers for its ability to remove up to 99.5 per cent of all dirt and oil, and dead skin cells, while also unclogging pores and removing makeup residue.

The 2019 Amazon Beauty Advent Calendar contains a combination of 24 products and deluxe samples from some of the site's most-loved beauty brands

Unlike other beauty advent calendars you cannot peak behind upcoming doors, as the calendar design only allows you to pull out the box with the relevant date. Only once you've revealed your beauty treat will the next box drop down.

And that's not all – if you loved the products you tried and tested in the Amazon Advent Calendar, you can scan the Amazon SmileCodes included in the accompanying leaflet to add the product to your online shopping basket – snazzy eh?

Previous Amazon Beauty Advent Calendars sold out shortly after launch, so we suggest snapping it up fast.

The Amazon Beauty Advent Calendar 2019 is on sale now.
